forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 2 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind 3 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun plays hide and seek along the edges of the horizon, Downtown San Francisco finds itself draped in a delicate veil of partly cloudy skies. The day unfolds with a pleasant chill, making its way to a high that gently edges up, then retreats, settling comfortably around 60 degrees. Those seeking solace in the crisp air may enjoy the subtle northwestern breeze that whispers through the streets, carrying with it the faint promise of coastal scents.

The visibility is notably clear today, allowing the city’s iconic landmarks to bask in the soft light, though a hint of fog might cling to the more distant hills, reminding us of the marine influence ever-present in this vibrant landscape. Evening beckons with a tranquil charm, predicting a drop to about 48 degrees; ideal for unhurried strolls or cozy gatherings. As you contemplate what to wear, layering becomes your steadfast companion — a light jacket over a long-sleeved shirt offers both comfort and warmth, allowing for the ebb and flow of shifting temperatures. Consider wandering to your favorite café to explore new chapters in your latest read, or perhaps meandering through Golden Gate Park, where the flora is beginning to stir with the promise of spring. The day offers simple pleasures, inviting you to savor the subtle nuances of urban life in one of the world’s most enchanting cities.
